IndexPage.title: Wedding App - Home Page
IndexPage.description: ¡Bienvenidos al ejemplo de Next.js Internationalization (i18n)! Esta demo muestra la potencia del App Router y cómo gestionar contenido multilingüe sin problemas utilizando next-intl

sections.locationsText1: We therefore have the pleasure to invite you to our wedding ceremony.
sections.locations1: Choose the perfect venue that captures the essence of your love story.
sections.grettingText: Please join us in Mexico City for our wedding!
sections.galleryText: Each photo tells a part of our story, from the simplest moments to the most extraordinary. We feel fortunate to have shared so many memories together and are excited to create many more in the future.
sections.subtitle: Confirm Your Assistance
sections.title: WE HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE
sections.descriptionForm: Fill the form below to confirm your assistance to the wedding.
sections.descriptionForm2: Due to space and capacity restrictions, we can only accommodate the guest named on your invitation.
sections.dressCodeDescription:
Ladies:
Formal dress (midi/maxi) or elegant pantsuit
Solid bright colors (preferred)
Please no white or similar
Dress shoes

Gentleman:
Suit (tie optional, no tuxedos required)
Dress shirt
Dress shoes
sections.accommodationsText: The wedding venue is located in downtown Mexico City (el centro). We recommend staying in Roma, Condesa, Reforma, Polanco or Juarez neighborhoods.
sections.accommodationsText2: Here are some hotel recommendations for each area:
sections.accommodationsHelp: Feel free to reach out to us if you need help with accommodations or have any questions!
sections.accommodationsHelp3: La Condesa is a vibrant and trendy neighborhood, known for its tree-lined streets, Art Deco architecture, and lively cultural scene. It offers a mix of stylish cafes, restaurants, boutiques and parks like Parque México and Parque España.
sections.accommodationsHelp2: La Roma is one of most iconic and culturally rich neighborhoods, known for its beautiful early 20th-century architecture, art galleries, indie bookstores, and vibrant food scene, it blends historic charm with a modern, bohemian spirit.
sections.accommodationsHelp5: Polanco is an upscale and cosmopolitan neighborhood, known for its luxury shopping, fine dining, and elegant residential areas. Often compared to Beverly Hills, it’s home to Presidente Masaryk Avenue, the city's most exclusive shopping street, as well as world-renowned restaurants and cultural institutions like the Soumaya Museum and Museo Jumex.
sections.accommodationsHelp4: Paseo de la Reforma is the most iconic avenue, stretching from the city center to the western neighborhoods. Inspired by the great boulevards of Europe, it’s lined with monuments, skyscrapers, museums, and public art. Key landmarks include the Angel of Independence, Diana the Huntress, and Chapultepec Park.

giftGuide.title: Gift Guide
giftGuide.description: We realize that it is expensive to travel to Mexico City for our wedding and your presence is a gift.
giftGuide.description2: If you would like to contribute to our honeymoon fund, we would be very grateful.

form.confirmationMessage: We look forward to seeing you at our wedding. You will receive an email with the wedding details. Please check your SPAM folder.
form.cannotAttendMessage: We are sorry you can't make it. You will receive an email with the wedding details. Please check your SPAM folder, which you can ignore.
form.eventLocation: Calle Gral. Prim 32, Juárez, Cuauhtémoc, 06600 Ciudad de México, CDMX

example.title: Example of internationalization
example.description: This is an example of how you can manage multilingual content in Next.js using next-intl. You can change the language in the navigation bar.

PasswordPage.description: Please enter the password to access our wedding details

NotFoundPage.title: Página no encontrada
NotFoundPage.description: ¡Uy! Parece que te has topado con una página que no existe. No te preocupes, nuestra magia de internacionalización sigue trabajando duro en otras partes de la aplicación. Siéntete libre de navegar de vuelta para explorar más

CardHero.hero:
Please join us in Mexico City for our wedding on
14 February 2026

AboutUs.title: About us
AboutUs.description-one: Our story began in 2022 with a swipe — literally. We met through Bumble and had our first date at the heart of Coyoacan, in Mexico City. Our two paths crossed unexpectedly… and we’ve been inseparable ever since.
AboutUs.description-two: After 3 years together—full of adventures, laughter, growth and love— and during a magical trip to Japan in April 2025, Max proposed in the peaceful town of Beppu. It was just the two of us… and a perfect “yes”.
AboutUs.description-three: This website is here to share all the important details about our big day.
AboutUs.description-four: We’re so grateful for the love and support we’ve received from friends and family. This wedding is not just about us, but about all the people who have been part of our journey.
AboutUs.description-five: We can’t wait to celebrate with you!
